rules: Rule1: If the carpet contains mold, then the environment is hazardous.
Rule2: Either the carpet contains mold or the mattress contains mold.
Rule3: The air sample tests negative for mold or the air sample tests positive for mold.
Rule4: Provided that mold exists in the house, the environment is hazardous.
Rule5: Whenever mold is located in the bedroom, mold exists in the house.
Rule6: Under the condition that mold is located in the living room, mold exists in the house.
Rule7: If mold is found on furniture, then either mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room.
Rule8: Mold is found on furniture or mold is found on fabric.
Rule9: If the technician uses a meter, then whenever mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room.
Rule10: Either the technician uses a meter or the technician uses a kit.
Rule11: Under the condition that the area is cleaned by a professional, the surface is treated by a professional.
Rule12: Provided that the surface is treated by a professional, the mold is removed by a professional.

Rule13: If the doctor recommends avoidance, then whenever the occupant visits a doctor, if the occupant takes medication, then under the condition that the occupant has asthma, the occupant is exposed to mold.
Rule14: If the doctor recommends medication, then provided that the occupant visits a doctor, if the occupant takes medication, then whenever the occupant has asthma, the occupant is exposed to mold.
Rule15: Under the condition that the patient agrees to the treatment, either the doctor recommends avoidance or the doctor recommends medication.
Rule16: The patient agrees to the treatment or the patient disagrees with the treatment.
Rule17: Whenever remediation is ineffective, it is not the case that remediation is effective.
Rule18: If symptoms are persistent, then symptoms are mild.
Rule19: Under the condition that the occupant has asthma, it is not the case that the occupant is exposed to mold.
Rule20: Either the occupant has asthma or if the mattress contains mold, then the environment is hazardous.
Rule21: If the condition worsens, then symptoms are persistent.
Rule22: If the environment is unsafe, then the environment is safe.

Rule23: Either health deteriorates or if it is not the case that if the occupant visits a doctor, then if the occupant takes medication, then under the condition that the occupant has asthma, the occupant is exposed to mold, then health improves.
Rule24: Provided that the air is purified, it is not the case that the air is contaminated.
Rule25: If the system is serviced, then the system is maintained.

Rule26: If the source is identified, then provided that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then whenever mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the mold is removed by a professional, then inspection is completed, then inspection is passed.
Rule27: Under the condition that the problem is documented, the source is identified.
Rule28: If the report is submitted, then the problem is documented.
Rule29: Either the report is submitted or the report is filed.
Rule30: Whenever the report is filed, the problem is documented.
Rule31: If the occupant uses an inhaler, then provided that the occupant has asthma, the occupant is exposed to mold.
Rule32: Either the occupant uses an inhaler or the occupant takes medication.
Rule33: Either the occupant visits a doctor or the occupant consults a specialist.
Rule34: If the occupant consults a specialist, then provided that the occupant takes medication, if the occupant has asthma, then the occupant is exposed to mold.

Rule35: Whenever the air sample tests positive for mold, if the occupant visits a doctor, then under the condition that the occupant takes medication, provided that the occupant has asthma, the occupant is exposed to mold.

Rule36: Provided that it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then under the condition that mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the area is cleaned by a professional.

Rule37: If it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then provided that mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the air is contaminated.

Rule38: Provided that it is not the case that if the patient disagrees with the treatment, then either the doctor recommends avoidance or the doctor recommends medication, then remediation is effective.
Rule39: If it is not the case that if the patient disagrees with the treatment, then either the doctor recommends avoidance or the doctor recommends medication, then remediation is ineffective.

Rule40: Provided that it is not the case that the patient considers relocation or if it is not the case that symptoms are severe or if the occupant has asthma then the occupant is exposed to mold, then the condition worsens, then the environment is unsafe.

Rule41: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then under the condition that mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the mold is removed by a professional, then it is not the case that inspection is completed.

Rule42: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then under the condition that mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the mold is removed by a professional, then inspection is completed, then it is not the case that inspection is passed.

Rule43: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then whenever mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the air is purified, then a HEPA filter is installed, then the system is serviced.

Rule44: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the technician uses a kit, then under the condition that mold is found on fabric, mold is located in the bedroom or mold is located in the living room, then the air is purified, then a HEPA filter is installed, then it is not the case that the system is maintained.
facts: Fact1: It is not the case that the air sample tests negative for mold.
Fact2: It is not the case that the mold is removed by a professional.
Fact3: It is not the case that symptoms are severe.
Fact4: It is not the case that symptoms are mild.
Fact5: It is not the case that the patient considers relocation.
Fact6: It is not the case that the environment is safe.
Fact7: It is not the case that health improves.
Fact8: It is not the case that health deteriorates.
Fact9: It is not the case that a HEPA filter is installed.
